name: Empty Vessel
flavor_text: "It's versatile. By itself, it's nothing, just an empty tube. But that's its deceptive beauty; it's all about what you fill it with. What you make it. What you make it do." —Banshee-44

frame.name: Lightweight Frame
frame.description:
One-shot handheld Grenade Launcher with remote detonation. 
[Shoot]  : Fire; release to detonate.

perks.description:
This weapon is optimized for an especially explosive payload.
  •  Greatly increases blast radius
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
  •  Slightly decreases projectile speed
perks.name: Volatile Launch

perks.description:
This weapon's launch parameters are particularly stable.
  •  Greatly increases stability
  •  Increases blast radius
  •  Decreases projectile speed
perks.name: Confined Launch

perks.description:
This weapon is weighted for vertical recoil.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases stability
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Countermass

perks.description:
This weapon's launch barrel is optimized for projectile speed.
  •  Greatly increases projectile speed
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases blast radius
perks.name: Hard Launch

perks.description:
This weapon's launch barrel is well-balanced.
  •  Slightly increases projectile speed
  •  Slightly increases blast radius
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Linear Compensator

perks.description:
This weapon's barrel provides faster projectiles and much faster aiming.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Increases projectile speed
perks.name: Quick Launch

perks.description:
This barrel is broadly optimized for firing control.
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Increases stability
  •  Increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases projectile speed
perks.name: Smart Drift Control

perks.description:
Grenade detonation has a brief blinding effect.
  •  Greatly decreases blast radius.
perks.name: Blinding Grenades

perks.description: Grenades fired from this weapon have increased proximity detection but a decreased blast radius.
perks.name: Proximity Grenades

perks.description:
Grenades fired from this weapon do increased damage on direct hits.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Spike Grenades

perks.description:
This weapon's projectiles are particularly light and quick.
  •  Increases projectile speed
  •  Increases reload speed
perks.name: High-Velocity Rounds

perks.description:
This weapon's projectiles travel faster and have a controlled explosion.
  •  Increases projectile speed
  •  Greatly increases stability
  •  Decreases blast radius
perks.name: Implosion Rounds

perks.description: Grenades fired from this weapon emit a blast that staggers enemies.
perks.name: Concussion Grenades

perks.description: This weapon can be drawn unbelievably fast.
perks.name: Quickdraw

perks.description: Increases handling, reload speed, and stability for each fully charged ability.
perks.name: Surplus

perks.description: Breaking a combatant's shield with this weapon fills its magazine from reserves. Energy weapons regenerate ammo on hit when matching the damage type to the combatant's shield.
perks.name: Genesis

perks.description: Each rapid kill with this weapon progressively increases reload speed for a short time.
perks.name: Feeding Frenzy

perks.description: The holstered weapon is automatically reloaded after a short period of time.
perks.name: Auto-Loading Holster

perks.description: Picking up Heavy ammo also grants ammo to this weapon.
perks.name: Lead from Gold

perks.description: Increased reload, stability, and handling when enemies are in close proximity.
perks.name: Threat Detector

perks.description: Overflows the magazine based on the number of rapid kills before reloading.
perks.name: Ambitious Assassin

perks.description: Increased ammo reserves. Faster reload, stow, and ready when you're crouching.
perks.name: Field Prep

perks.description: This weapon gains a boost to reload speed as your health gets lower.
perks.name: Underdog

perks.description: Breaking an enemy's shield with this weapon makes them more vulnerable to Kinetic damage for a brief period.
perks.name: Disruption Break

perks.description: Reloading grants increased damage based on the number of rapid kills made beforehand.
perks.name: Multikill Clip

perks.description: Rapidly defeating targets triggers health regeneration. Guardians and powerful combatants count as more than one kill.
perks.name: Unrelenting

perks.description: Faster time to aim down sights.
perks.name: Snapshot Sights

perks.description: The blast radius of this weapon increases when surrounded by combatants.
perks.name: Danger Zone

perks.description: Kills with this weapon generate grenade energy. Activating your grenade ability reloads this weapon from reserves.
perks.name: Demolitionist

perks.description: Increased damage against bosses, vehicles, and Guardians with their Super active.
perks.name: Vorpal Weapon

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage from melee kills and kills with this weapon.
perks.name: Swashbuckler

perks.description: Hitting three separate targets increases damage for a moderate duration.
perks.name: One for All

perks.description: Killing combatants with this weapon generates a small amount of Super energy.
perks.name: Thresh
